ygData.subject: KABONG! Re: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: Harmonic, official warning for unnecessary flame.  I let the thread roll a little because sometimes we all just need to vent once in a while - however this
ygData.messageBody:
Harmonic, official warning for unnecessary flame. I let the thread roll a
little because sometimes we all just need to vent once in a while - however
this shows that we don't have the maturity to discuss it without turning it
into a flame war.

Thread Kabong'd.

Talies the UberSemiDictator


At 05:13 AM 4/4/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: SteelWolf <steelwolf@...>
>
>
> > Ugh. this post I find very undesirable reading. I think opinions about
> > Verant's quality should be left off this list. The start of this thread
> > was basically a request to keep things from being a "flame Verant" event
> > if I understood correctly. This entire post was nothing but a long rant,
> > and just showed to drive the orginial poster's point home. If your
> > intent is to drive people away from reading eqbards that want to learn
> > more about the bard class, you are succeeding.
>
> Give me a fucking break, don't ever post shit like that again.
> If you have a problem with me address it to me. I'm growing
> very tired of you Verant asskissers. That clear enough?
>
> Use your power, and press the delete key, because you are the naive
> one here buddy. I for one don't give a shit about what you think
> after that kind of bashing. ;)
>
> btw, have a nice day.
>
> Harmonic.
